messages:
Name: Edson Álvarez
Nationality: Mexico
Date of Birth: October 24, 1997
Position: Midfielder
Current club: West Ham United
Premier League clubs played for: West Ham United
West Ham United midfielder Edson Álvarez wasn't involved in either of the two Premier League matches that his team have played so far in 2025/2026.
Álvarez last featured in a Premier League game on May 25, 2025, playing 80 minutes for West Ham United versus Ipswich Town in a 3-1 win.
West Ham United next face a trip to Nottingham Forest in Premier League action on August 31.
Álvarez played 28 Premier League games last season for West Ham United and created one assist.
Álvarez joined West Ham United in August 2023 from Ajax, for whom he made 98 league appearances in total, scoring 10 goals and providing six assists.

The midfielder debuted in a Premier League fixture for West Ham United on August 20, 2023 as a substitute versus Chelsea at the age of 25 years and 300 days. In his Premier League career overall, he has appeared 59 times in the competition, with one goal scored and two assists.
